column4: i'm not a networking guru my anymeans,  but if no one else is trying to help you.    route add default gw 192.168.1.200 <<< if that's the server end. on the client end of things might help you.   also is ipv4 forwarding enabled ?   edit /etc/sysctl to enable
##windows  might be more helpful   seeing that it's probably the client that needs work.
i don't do windows,  but you need to set the linux boxes ip as the default gateway
well one other thing to consider    iptables      if you have things firewalled out you may be blocking the lan as well as the world     just a thought.
